column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. SEEMS LIKE ALL THE RUSSIANS ARE EITHER DEAD OR FLEEING. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE JUST DOWNED RUSSIAN HIND. NO MORE TARGETS LEFT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. ROGER THAT. GOOD WORK. KEEP YOUR EYES OPEN OUT THERE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
